overview:
Hristo Hristov, COO at Witnez.com.

Hristo Hristov is a twenty years old web developer, who started to work as a freelancer from the age of 15. He loves to build complex websites from scratch and often participates in the product development process. He started his career with Java, GWT and C++ development. His real passion is PHP and he has 4+ years of development experience (sometimes using different frameworks such as CodeIgniter and CakePHP). He is keen on AJAX, MySQL and Database design.

On the front end he has excellent skills in JS\JQuery and he’s using the latest technologies such as HTML 5, LESS and CSS3.

Although not an expert, Hristo has experience in Linux and cloud servers administration.
